cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Check out this month's update to Xperience by Kentico. AIRA - Xperience's AI powered assistant - now helps marketers transform content into other languages and provides insights about customer journey segmentation. We also added payment method and shipping option updates for digital commerce, and content sync support for forms.

Like all AIRA features, [AI translation can be enabled or disabled globally](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/configuration/aira-configuration#manage-aira-features) according to your team or company's AI use policy.
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"c76ce1ed-5414-4df3-878b-d48604cedcff"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"7bcadbb0-5994-43cc-bcb1-48cf67a2bd3c","markdownStyle":"04a6d83a-fd48-43e6-b91b-317188b4ea1d","markdownStyleParsed":"cd2091b5-3a92-4cce-a90c-c814965de7da","markdownCodeLanguage":"285025ce-f21d-45be-85c7-0e9679c053ca","id":"9a493656-557f-419b-bebe-bb75c6f782f3"}}]},{"identifier":"f8635249-ebe9-4872-8ddf-b1db402388f4","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"e65aa428-367f-429c-86fe-5fc1bf035d14","properties":{"markdown":"Try using AI (like [ChatGPT](https://chatgpt.com/) or [Google Gemini](https://gemini.google.com/)) to generate your initial translation instructions. This can help you quickly create well-structured instructions for AIRA which you can then easily tune for your specific content requirements.

Bonus points if your AI already has access to your marketing strategy and business profile as context!
","markdownStyle":"Note","markdownStyleParsed":1,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"ca4eb3d2-7f17-4af6-9e53-d3a2e3ab27e3"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"a8947bf7-97ae-4fa0-b6e8-4bada1be4af9","markdownStyle":"e73dffa3-aaea-4a0e-83d9-3d7498a992ae","markdownStyleParsed":"e35cea31-f20c-461b-a067-9d8317a8b3cf","markdownCodeLanguage":"31c93886-2fe7-481f-b6aa-8d08677605fe","id":"38c6fe37-c971-4d55-89ad-ca6155b5ee19"}}]},{"identifier":"1323ef09-98d7-4345-80ff-a9b5abb1e772","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"e1c70792-c3d6-4f82-af0e-371be3180e4f","properties":{"markdown":"Today, AIRA only translates the current content item and does not yet automatically translate linked content items or taxonomies.

journeys","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"078fecef-41cb-4d16-8f68-524ff54d04c7"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"1e2896b5-5a3e-4a91-94c0-42a938c35a09","headingLevel":"ef841365-7eea-488b-a557-fe99070677ee","headingLevelsParsed":"650ad5dd-603b-4f5d-8afc-c9e9416f7a80","headingAlignment":"e3004afe-1546-4818-be79-5e673a7530df","headingAlignmentsParsed":"3d63d798-fe1d-4555-b141-302c2c9fec45","showHeadingAnchor":"ac023f26-b005-4ea1-bdff-12df961096c5","id":"ad93ddda-450b-4696-8a65-28837d20eb97"}}]},{"identifier":"2dd26793-4dae-4c2e-8da2-d88e85b59d2f","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"2c767a43-c5bd-4ded-aae9-cc8da2900de5","properties":{"markdown":"Earlier this year, we gave marketers access to a powerful tool for exploration and optimization of how visitors engage with digital experiences - [customer journeys](/blog/xperience-by-kentico-refresh-march-24-2025#effective-customer-experiences). With the [easy-to-use customer journey builder](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/business-users/digital-marketing/customer-journeys#create-a-customer-journey), marketers define the distilled engagement funnels, using customer data points collected across all their digital channels.

As the number of [dynamic customer segmentation contact groups](https://docs.kentico.com/x/o4PWCQ) grows and customer journeys become more complex, crossing channel boundaries, marketers can struggle to answer simple questions, like "Which customers are failing to convert?" and "How should I optimize my customer experiences to increase my KPIs?"

We added [AIRA's insights to customer journeys](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/business-users/digital-marketing/customer-journeys#customer-journey-insights) to answer these exact questions for marketers in this month's Refresh.
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"4db41001-7160-4eea-8976-4d36b3c1126e"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"47eaae20-4966-4986-b1ad-826f7ab9c59c","markdownStyle":"1877ea04-a16e-4017-aaa0-5c30a9c04421","markdownStyleParsed":"83741f5f-0946-4fb8-9358-02f8007569f4","markdownCodeLanguage":"a26df480-7c3e-4397-a484-9b43811c5264","id":"10a8df2d-aa1f-42b6-968d-439fad92e192"}}]},{"identifier":"e5a28a9a-67b9-4033-b8ce-6ad628e7713f","type":"CommunityPortal.ImageWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"0f25192a-5dbc-4cde-a310-4af02c9a237b","properties":{"selectedImages":[{"identifier":"f9c41722-b4be-4aa7-aac2-8a17b9cde32e"}],"alignment":"Center","alignmentParsed":1,"size":"Medium","sizeParsed":1,"showDescriptionAsCaption":false,"linkToFullsizeImage":true,"id":"6c64e6ab-cee6-48c3-aac7-5d7c994af14e"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"selectedImages":"798f44e4-d0d2-4c21-b9ab-e57f9c225fb3","alignment":"ff3448b8-c040-445e-b561-c13397a2e1b5","alignmentParsed":"853a5da8-52e8-4edc-9f26-3d7e9e28f8c0","size":"b060bd4f-571a-4ccd-a982-dd872f73d95e","sizeParsed":"da7da2d8-f3a9-45cc-88cc-cfbed6728504","showDescriptionAsCaption":"af88309f-6782-4a64-9a0b-493fb2c883e4","linkToFullsizeImage":"cadae702-b499-4dba-9665-844aae826459","id":"94365b4b-56b2-4e24-b1cd-33b4f091047e"}}]},{"identifier":"d86cc0e3-e7d5-4306-9b10-84da1c6a2cb1","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"29bebba6-0041-43bb-a923-dac2a46f6567","properties":{"markdown":"All marketers need to do is define their first customer journey and they can begin strategizing with AIRA through the [in-product guidance chat experience](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/business-users/aira#aira-in-product-guidance).

AIRA has access to the context of the current screen and can recommend helpful starting points for conversations about customer journeys - like a quick review of the steps and statistics for a given journey.

can use one of AIRA's suggested prompts or create their own.

* Which contact groups are reaching my conversion goal for this customer journey and increasing my KPIs?

* Which contact groups might be unrelated to this journey, due to low engagement numbers?

* AIRA, do you recommend any tactical or strategic improvements to the customer experience to improve KPIs with a low performing group or capitalize on the best performing ones?

Additionally, AIRA has access to the Xperience by Kentico documentation, guides, and expert-level marketing knowledge, and can suggest you try using [personalization](https://docs.kentico.com/x/p4PWCQ) or [automation](https://docs.kentico.com/x/automation_xp) to optimize your results.

personalized commerce experiences are an important tool in many marketers' toolbox - they drive revenue growth and help marketers prove the ROI of the technology tools they use.

This is why we released [digital commerce in Xperience by Kentico in the July 2025 Refresh](/blog/xperience-by-kentico-refresh-july-24-2025#production-ready-digital-commerce) and why we continue to add features to that core commerce capability.

This month we added the ability for store administrators to [create and manage payment methods and shipping options](https://docs.kentico.com/x/payment_methods_xp) directly from Xperience's commerce configuration user interface.

these basic commerce data objects do not support versioning, localization, and custom content themselves, reusable content items in the Content hub can include any of these content features you need and model any additional content fields (like icons or taxonomy). They can then [link to the payment methods and shipping options you create](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/digital-commerce-setup/configure-shipping-and-payment-methods#display-shipping-and-payment-methods).

This gives marketers and developers complete control over the digital commerce experiences for customers, clearly separating configuration from content and messaging.

Because order information is often used as a historical snapshot of the customer's purchase, the shipping and payment names at the point of order creation are captured, along with references to the configuration, and stored with the order information.

We believe this will help teams tune the commerce experience to meet customer expectations.

forms","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"4b0248c6-da98-4d55-9707-2873be67c8eb"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"7ae270e9-78ec-4982-a96e-eff801a0592b","headingLevel":"f5980d72-ea2e-4a7d-a0bf-e0d9a95561b6","headingLevelsParsed":"379db779-81be-4749-8f54-0fc37312a5f2","headingAlignment":"6dbe86ab-5837-4fdd-be93-9caf566a5eb4","headingAlignmentsParsed":"4ba52782-ff46-411e-8c62-5d299ab50d8f","showHeadingAnchor":"02ae680b-a4ed-41c5-a24e-0a70ebd4e7d1","id":"02d44839-4452-4016-b725-36a9c708caa5"}}]},{"identifier":"b976882a-8e2d-4ba7-abb2-893492f4ad64","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"a73a5fe0-e2cd-48c8-a0c5-cb4bd59122d2","properties":{"markdown":"[Content governance](https://www.kentico.com/discover/lexik#C) is often a challenge for marketers using less mature content management tools. Managing who is publishing each piece of content in all environments and the impact this has on customer experiences can all too quickly become a full-time job.

We introduced [content sync](/blog/xperience-by-kentico-refresh-may-19-2025#content-sync) as a solution to this challenge and we adopted our iterative improvement approach to enhance it later with [support for syncing web pages](/blog/xperience-by-kentico-refresh-july-24-2025#content-sync-for-web-pages).

August's Refresh brings an additional web page syncing feature with [content sync for Form Builder forms](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/business-users/content-sync#forms).

When the marketer opts-in to include forms as part of a web page sync, all referenced forms across all selected pages will be synchronized up to the next environment.

But, what happens when you have created a form that's used in code, like in [a web page layout](https://docs.kentico.com/x/q4jWCQ)? There's no Form widget in this scenario.

","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"1bac2f10-c6e9-41e5-9bc9-0256b7857483"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"5158941e-a413-4c62-abb0-66a996e73260","markdownStyle":"1250206b-1300-4e51-b7da-ede0e367342b","markdownStyleParsed":"85fcf3ce-5b68-41f7-9a03-27f304f2233a","markdownCodeLanguage":"b3ad1a7d-8183-4a0d-a35d-f1984035a448","id":"a4269ba8-3d96-49c5-a6ab-f7340157725e"}}]},{"identifier":"ef00d7a3-2933-48fe-86cf-a046c06d1ac7","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"0af51030-c5d8-483f-9d63-b95fdae0faa9","properties":{"markdown":"Form synchronization currently focuses on [the form definition and its fields](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/business-users/content-sync#what-is-not-synchronized). It does not include form submission data, autoresponder settings, automation processes related to the form, form submission notifications, or the visibility configuration of featured form fields.

This prevents test data from accidentally being synchronized, but also requires configuring the form's related objects, like autoresponder emails and triggered automations, in the synchronization target environment.

restore","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"c7bdaf65-f33f-4a6a-95a4-f4da20ef7da6"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"7b6f639a-b12f-425f-a359-0a609048d62d","headingLevel":"a64cd84f-2559-49ac-82b0-054a488701cf","headingLevelsParsed":"db820ad0-f3d3-4ad9-8d4e-2e019d785974","headingAlignment":"91562b1e-8789-4683-91b4-2bf50aee778b","headingAlignmentsParsed":"0fe65c96-3dce-415b-91e7-815f4ab6054b","showHeadingAnchor":"d553b761-32ed-401f-afd7-ebe8006885e9","id":"efae8df7-c398-441e-b474-edd6a5be8d1b"}}]},{"identifier":"4c95b128-bf2c-4707-a5ec-43856f21e314","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"e8fabbdb-1a14-4428-a628-41ad1b330bb7","properties":{"markdown":"Depending on project goals and marketing strategy, new Xperience by Kentico projects might include large amounts of content and data when they launch. However, upgrades from older versions of Kentico almost always do because these websites have often been running in production for several years.

Xperience by Kentico SaaS [limits the maximum size of deployment packages](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/deployment/deploy-to-the-saas-environment#deployment-process-overview) to help minimize the deployment time. What happens to these larger projects that launch with thousands of content items, assets, and business data?

Our support team works directly with our partner agencies and customers to ensure smooth deployments and project launches. However, this hands-on process can require significant coordination and time for all parties involved.

To improve this experience for SaaS users, we added a [completely self-service custom restore feature](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/deployment/deploy-to-the-saas-environment/manage-saas-deployments#custom-restore) to the Xperience Portal that doesn't include these limitations for content, data, or asset deployment.

Users are prompted to create a new session, which is a time-limited and secure access to the tenant's storage infrastructure.

the session is initialized, users can define optional IP access filtering to the storage infrastructure. The IP filtering is an added safeguard to ensure that even if someone acquires the session's SAS URLs, they cannot access the infrastructure from non-approved IP addresses.

Then, the user gains access to the secured SAS URLs which can be used in [Microsoft's Azure Storage Explorer tool](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/storage/storage-explorer).

Finally, the project's large amounts of assets and a database backup can be uploaded to the storage infrastructure and the user can initiate a restore from that data.

For the technical audience, the entire detailed process is [outlined in our documentation](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/deployment/deploy-to-the-saas-environment/manage-saas-deployments#perform-a-custom-restore).

We know this feature will have a huge time-savings impact for our customers and partner agencies, streamlining their Xperience by Kentico SaaS project deployments and launches.

websites, email channels with long-running newsletters and many subscribers, or headless channels tracking a lot of user engagement can generate a large amount of customer data.

This data helps marketers understand the impact of their digital experiences and [where to optimize them](https://docs.kentico.com/x/customer_journeys_xp).

Too much data will, at best, distract from the high-value activities and trends, and at worst, also have an impact on the performance of an Xperience by Kentico solution and increase infrastructure costs!

To help keep marketers from drowning in low value customer data we added [automatic inactive contact deletion](https://docs.kentico.com/x/delete_inactive_contacts_xp).

This will, by default, remove all customer data (including activities, consents, and email recipients) for contacts that have not performed an activity within the last *365 days*. The time frame is configurable to fit different business and customer relationships, for example, a seasonal customer base.

For teams who are looking to curate rather than prune their contacts, Xperience now also supports [a custom, programmatic approach in C#](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/digital-marketing-setup/contact-configuration/delete-inactive-contacts#implement-custom-deletion-of-contacts) that gives you full control using a new `IContactsBulkDeletionService` API.

next?","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"299ec356-0534-409d-914a-9d2d847fb451"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"01cb51ae-689b-45f9-b563-09fd5d90e369","headingLevel":"5ea92e06-c065-4a8a-adad-a3e7c1236cf9","headingLevelsParsed":"e5d85837-814b-4f28-8465-b9d5cec57303","showHeadingAnchor":"e54ff62c-71fa-4b7e-8119-ec791aec0c74","headingAlignment":"332becff-c323-4930-9884-c99db26a7027","headingAlignmentsParsed":"90893b06-587b-4904-81df-abcaf2100c02","id":"62f6ba74-b1ed-4be0-9a8e-7b68f3ad9b48"}}]},{"identifier":"4712de43-8955-4b57-8c73-63335b5636ac","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"2e17faef-b100-4c39-8f7a-befc9fc485e8","properties":{"markdown":"As always, check out [our documentation Changelog](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/changelog#refresh-august-25-2025) for the full Refresh feature and technical details.

We hope these new capabilities, features, and API improvements unlock solutions for you. Try them out, [let us know](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/6-next-refreshes) 👋 what you think.

Next month's roadmap [plans for several exciting features](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/6-next-refreshes).

* [Digital Commerce - Price calculation service (preview)](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/313-digital-commerce-price-calculation-service-preview-), introducing an extensible default service to handle core pricing logic, with customization options based on business rules.

* [AI Translations 3 - Generate language variants for linked content using AIRA](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/341-ai-translations-3-generate-language-variants-including-linked-content-using-aira), extending AI translations to include linked content when generating new language variants.

* [AI Translations 4 - Generate language variant for multiple items using AIRA](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/342-ai-translations-4-generate-language-variant-for-multiple-items-using-aira), enabling marketers to create new language variants for multiple items at once.

* [Documentation and guides through the Kentico Knowledge MCP](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/338-provide-documentation-and-guides-through-the-kentico-knowledge-mcp), improving access to documentation and guides for developers and users working with Kentico.

* [Enhanced Recipient Targeting for Emails](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/321-enhanced-recipient-targeting-for-emails), giving marketers more flexible audience targeting by introducing segmented recipient control.

* [AIRA image variants - Usability & Scalability Enhancements](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/344--improvement-usability-scalability-enhancements), enhancing the flexibility and scalability of AI-generated image variants with dynamic variant support.

These updates will, as always, accompany a number of UX and developer-focused improvements.
